text:
Long Content Test

This file is designed to test Slack limits:

1. Text section character limit (3000).
2. Message block limit (40).
3. Message character limit (12000).

Long Section 1 (3500 chars)

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
